languages.text: "И извлекала из этого огромную выгоду. Власть {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g} не бесконечна, как и защита, даруемая им. Все эти таинственные экспедиции, сомнительные эксперименты, коллекционирование ксенотехнологических диковинок — опасные забавы. Чтобы предаваться им без последствий, мало иметь лишь разрешение {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Нужно еще, чтобы не рассердился я".

traits.locale_text: "Конечно. И извлекала из этого огромную выгоду. Думаете, одного Патента достаточно, чтобы совершать таинственные экспедиции и скрывать их результаты, коллекционировать ксеyотехнологические диковинки и держать в свите несанкционированного псайкера? Я удивлю вас, {name}, но порой дружба со скромным инквизитором значит больше, чем подпись самого Императора".

languages.text: "And benefited greatly from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}'s power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."
languages.original_text: "И извлекала из этого огромную выгоду. Власть {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g} не бесконечна, как и защита, даруемая им. Все эти таинственные экспедиции, сомнительные эксперименты, коллекционирование ксенотехнологических диковинок — опасные забавы. Чтобы предаваться им без последствий, мало иметь лишь разрешение {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Нужно еще, чтобы не рассердился я".

traits.locale_text: "And benefited greatly from it. The Warrant's power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the Emperor's permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I'm not displeased by it."

"And benefited greatly from it. The Warrant's power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the Emperor's permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I'm not displeased by it."

"And benefited greatly from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}'s power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."

"And benefited greatly from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}'s power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."

"And benefited greatly from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}'s power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."

languages.text: 「協力関係から得るものは大いにあった。{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}の力にも、その保護範囲にも際限はない。謎の多い探査旅行、怪しげな実験。一風変わった異星技術の収集はどれも危険な娯楽だ。結果を出さずにこうした娯楽を追求するというのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の許可だけでできるものではない。ひとつには、娯楽に興じるあまり、私の機嫌を損ねないことも必要だ」
languages.original_text: "And benefited greatly from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}'s power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."

traits.locale_text: 「協力関係から得るものは大いにあった。{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}の力にも、その保護範囲にも際限はない。謎の多い探査旅行、怪しげな実験。一風変わった異星技術の収集はどれも危険な娯楽だ。結果を出さずにこうした娯楽を追求するというのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の許可だけでできるものではない。ひとつには、娯楽に興じるあまり、私の機嫌を損ねないことも必要だ」

languages.original_text: "And benefited greatly from it. The Warrant's power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the Emperor's permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."

languages.text: “不仅合作过，而且受益匪浅。{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}并不能授予你无法无天的特权，它能提供的保护也相当有限。所有那些神秘的探险、可疑的实验、异形的奇技淫巧，都是危险的消遣。若是打算从事这样的活动，而又不想承担任何后果，光靠{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的许可恐怕是远远不够的。若你有这个打算，必须要保证别惹恼了我。”
languages.original_text: "And benefited greatly from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}'s power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."

traits.locale_text: “不仅合作过，而且受益匪浅。{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}并不能授予你无法无天的特权，它能提供的保护也相当有限。所有那些神秘的探险、可疑的实验、异形的奇技淫巧，都是危险的消遣。若是打算从事这样的活动，而又不想承担任何后果，光靠{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的许可恐怕是远远不够的。若你有这个打算，必须要保证别惹恼了我。”

languages.text: «Y se benefició enormemente al hacerlo. El poder de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} dista mucho de ser ilimitado, al igual que la protección que ofrece. Las expediciones misteriosas, los experimentos dudosos y las colecciones de xenotecnología son pasatiempos peligrosos. Hace falta más que el permiso del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} para disfrutar de ellos sin consecuencias. De entrada, hay que asegurarse de que no me desagraden».
languages.original_text: "And benefited greatly from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}'s power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."

traits.locale_text: «Y se benefició enormemente al hacerlo. El poder de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} dista mucho de ser ilimitado, al igual que la protección que ofrece. Las expediciones misteriosas, los experimentos dudosos y las colecciones de xenotecnología son pasatiempos peligrosos. Hace falta más que el permiso del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} para disfrutar de ellos sin consecuencias. De entrada, hay que asegurarse de que no me desagraden».

languages.text: « Et elle en tirait beaucoup d'avantages. La {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} offre pouvoir et protection, certes, mais seulement dans une certaine mesure. Les expéditions mystérieuses, les expériences douteuses et les collections de xénotechnologie sont des passe-temps fort dangereux qui nécessitent bien plus que la simple autorisation de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} ; il faut également s'assurer qu'ils ne me contrarient pas. »
languages.original_text: "And benefited greatly from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}'s power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."

traits.locale_text: « Et elle en tirait beaucoup d'avantages. La {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} offre pouvoir et protection, certes, mais seulement dans une certaine mesure. Les expéditions mystérieuses, les expériences douteuses et les collections de xénotechnologie sont des passe-temps fort dangereux qui nécessitent bien plus que la simple autorisation de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} ; il faut également s'assurer qu'ils ne me contrarient pas. »

languages.text: "Und im großen Stil davon profitiert. Die Macht des {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} ist nicht unendlich, genauso wenig wie der Schutz, den er gewährt. All diese geheimnisvollen Expeditionen, zweifelhaften Experimente, Sammlungen von Xenotech-Objekten sind ein gefährlicher Zeitvertreib. Es bedarf mehr als der Erlaubnis des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, um ihm ohne Konsequenzen nachzugehen. Ihr müsst auch dafür sorgen, dass mir das Ganze nicht missfällt."
languages.original_text: "And benefited greatly from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}'s power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."

traits.locale_text: "Und im großen Stil davon profitiert. Die Macht des {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} ist nicht unendlich, genauso wenig wie der Schutz, den er gewährt. All diese geheimnisvollen Expeditionen, zweifelhaften Experimente, Sammlungen von Xenotech-Objekten sind ein gefährlicher Zeitvertreib. Es bedarf mehr als der Erlaubnis des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, um ihm ohne Konsequenzen nachzugehen. Ihr müsst auch dafür sorgen, dass mir das Ganze nicht missfällt."

languages.text: "İş birliğimizden büyük faydalar elde ediyordu. {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'nin{/g} gücü sonsuz değildir. Sağladığı koruma da. Bütün bu gizemli keşif yolculukları, şüphe uyandıran deneyler, zeno teknolojisi koleksiyonları hep tehlike arz eden uğraşılar. Sonuçlarına katlanmadan bunların peşinde koşabilmek için {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} izninden daha fazlası gerekir. Kişinin, benim hoşnutsuz kalmadığımdan emin olması da gerekir."
languages.original_text: "And benefited greatly from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}'s power is not without limit, and neither is the protection it provides. All those mysterious expeditions, dubious experiments, collections of xenotech oddities are dangerous pastimes. It takes more than the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s permission to pursue them without consequences. One must also make sure I am not displeased by it."

traits.locale_text: "Bundan da büyük faydalar elde ediyordu. {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}'nin gücü sonsuz değildir. Sağladığı koruma da. Bütün bu gizemli keşif yolculukları, şüphe uyandıran deneyler, zeno teknolojisi koleksiyonları hep tehlike arz eden uğraşılar. Sonuçlarına katlanmadan bunların peşinde koşabilmek için {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un izninden daha fazlası gerekir. Kişinin benin hoşnutsuz kalmadığımdan emin olması da gerekir."
